name: Rune of Lightning
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Construct Modifications/Rune-Carved/Rune of Lightning

sections.body: This rune is triggered when the modified construct is hit by a melee attack. The rune releases a 5-foot-radius burst of electricity dealing 3d8 points of electrical damage to all creatures within the burst. A successful DC 12 Reflex saving throw halves the damage.
